name: THE JUNE SEASON
description:
Overview

THE JUNE SEASON tells an unconventional story.

Daniel is an old purple rabbit, who was convicted of murder many decades ago. After years and years behind bars, he leaves prison with a need for redemption and forgiveness, and sense of sorrow for what he did.

Not only is he remorseful, but also deeply scared. Will he go to heaven after what he did? Or will he stay in hell for all eternity? He soon starts to have several dreams about his situation, all of them scarier and weirder than the one before.

Your goal as the player is to go through these dreams, surviving, until eventually reaching Daniel's beloved redemption.

This game contains a few mature themes, as well as a lot of scary, freaky cartoon stuff.

Credits

Coding, art and original music by Benjamín Turren.

Daniel artwork by Rosepuff.

For game updates, check it's trashy season.
